cd:boolean.name: makeLegendFigure
cd:boolean.description: Should we make a separate figure containing the legend, so we do not need to include the legend into the other/actual figures (to save space)?

cd:boolean.name: showAxisTitles
cd:boolean.description: Should we show the titles of the axes?

cd:double.name: minX
cd:double.description: The minimum value of the x-axis. If this paramter is not specified, the smallest x-coordinate will be used.

cd:double.name: maxX
cd:double.description: The maximum value of the x-axis. If this paramter is not specified, the largest x-coordinate will be used.

cd:double.name: minY
cd:double.description: The minimum value of the y-axis. If this paramter is not specified, the smallest y-coordinate will be used.

cd:double.name: maxY
cd:double.description: The maximum value of the y-axis. If this paramter is not specified, the largest y-coordinate will be used.

cd:boolean.name: rankingPlot
cd:boolean.description: Instead of plotting the function ('y') values, rank them for each value of 'x'. This will make it much easier to see when which function takes on a larger value than another one. This may be necessary if the 'y' axis spans over values of different order of magnitude.
